text: The 2009 Continental Tire Sports Car Challenge season was the ninth running of the Grand Am Cup Series. It began on January 22 and ran for ten rounds. ==Schedule== *Daytona International Speedway *Homestead Miami Speedway *New Jersey Motorsports Park *Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca *Lime Rock Park- split classes *Watkins Glen International- long course *Mid-Ohio Sports Car Course- split classes *Barber Motorsports Park *Circuit de Trois-Rivieres *Miller Motorsports Park *Virginia International Raceway Continental Tire Sports Car Challenge
title: 2009 Continental Tire Sports Car Challenge season
